workflow.name: Automate supplier risk scoring with D&B, NewsAPI & alerts to Gmail
workflow.description:
### **How it works**
- **Continuous monitoring**: Real-time surveillance of supplier performance, financial health, and operational status
- **Risk scoring**: AI-powered assessment of supplier risks across multiple dimensions (financial, operational, geopolitical)
- **Automated alerts**: Instant notifications when supplier risk levels exceed predefined thresholds
- **Contingency activation**: Automatic triggering of backup suppliers and alternative sourcing plans

### **Set up steps**
- **Supplier database**: Connect your ERP/procurement system with complete supplier information
- **Financial data sources**: Integrate with credit monitoring services (Dun & Bradstreet, Experian)
- **News monitoring**: Configure news APIs for real-time supplier-related news tracking
- **Performance metrics**: Set up KPIs tracking (delivery times, quality scores, compliance)
- **Alert systems**: Configure Slack, Teams, or email notifications for risk alerts
- **Backup protocols**: Define alternative supplier activation procedures

### **Key Features**
- **üîç 360¬∞ supplier visibility**: Complete view of supplier ecosystem health and performance
- **‚ö° Real-time risk detection**: Immediate identification of potential supply chain disruptions
- **üìä Predictive analytics**: Forecasting potential supplier issues before they impact operations
- **üö® Automated escalation**: Risk-based alert system with appropriate stakeholder notifications
- **üìà Performance benchmarking**: Continuous comparison against industry standards and peers
- **üîÑ Contingency management**: Automated backup supplier activation and procurement rerouting
- **üåç Geopolitical monitoring**: Tracking of regulatory changes and political risks by region
- **üí∞ Cost impact analysis**: Financial impact assessment of supplier disruptions

### **Risk categories monitored**
- **Financial stability**: Credit scores, payment delays, bankruptcy indicators
- **Operational performance**: Delivery reliability, quality metrics, capacity utilization
- **Compliance status**: Regulatory adherence, certifications, audit results
- **Geopolitical risks**: Political instability, trade restrictions, regulatory changes
- **Environmental factors**: Natural disasters, climate risks, sustainability metrics
- **Cyber security**: Security breaches, data protection compliance

### **Automated responses**
- **Low risk (0-30)**: Routine monitoring and performance tracking
- **Medium risk (31-60)**: Enhanced monitoring with supplier engagement
- **High risk (61-80)**: Immediate supplier contact and mitigation planning
- **Critical risk (81-100)**: Emergency protocols and backup supplier activation

### **Integration capabilities**
- **ERP systems**: SAP, Oracle, Microsoft Dynamics for procurement data
- **Risk platforms**: Resilinc, Riskmethods, Prewave for specialized risk intelligence
- **Financial services**: Credit monitoring and financial health assessment
- **News APIs**: Real-time news monitoring and sentiment analysis
- **Communication tools**: Slack, Teams, email for stakeholder notifications

This workflow provides comprehensive supply chain visibility and proactive risk management, enabling companies to maintain operational continuity while minimizing disruption costs.

parameters.content:
## Supply Chain Monitor

‚öôÔ∏è **Configure risk parameters:**
- Risk thresholds by category
- Supplier criticality levels
- Alert escalation rules
- Backup supplier priorities

parameters.query: SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, category, criticality_level, last_delivery_date, quality_score, payment_terms, country FROM suppliers WHERE status = 'active'

SELECT AVG(delivery_score) as avg_delivery, AVG(quality_score) as avg_quality, COUNT(late_deliveries) as late_count FROM supplier_performance WHERE supplier_id = '{{ $json.supplier_id }}' AND date >= NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days'

parameters.message:
=

üö® CRITICAL SUPPLIER RISK

Immediate action required - Risk Level: {{ $json.risk_score }}/100

üè¢ Supplier Details

Category: {{ $json.category }}

Country: {{ $json.country }}

Risk Score: {{ $json.risk_color }} {{ $json.risk_score }}/100

    {{#each $json.risk_factors}}
  • {{ this }}

Financial Risk: {{ $json.financial_risk }}/35

Operational Risk: {{ $json.operational_risk }}/30

News/Reputation Risk: {{ $json.news_risk }}/15

Geopolitical Risk: {{ $json.geopolitical_risk }}/10

üìä Potential Impact

Financial Impact: ${{ $json.potential_impact.financial.toLocaleString() }}

Operational Impact: {{ $json.potential_impact.operational }}

Response Timeline: {{ $json.potential_impact.timeline }}

üéØ Immediate Actions Required

  • Contact supplier immediately to assess situation
  • Activate backup suppliers for critical components
  • Review and update contingency plans
  • Notify stakeholders and affected departments
  • Document all mitigation actions taken
üìû Emergency Contact üìß Notify Procurement

Alert generated: {{ $json.assessed_at }}
Supplier ID: {{ $json.supplier_id }}

=

üü† HIGH RISK SUPPLIER

Enhanced monitoring required - Risk Score: {{ $json.risk_score }}/100

A high-risk situation has been identified with one of our suppliers. Please review and take appropriate action.

üìã Supplier Summary

Category: {{ $json.category }}

Risk Level: {{ $json.risk_color }} {{ $json.risk_level }} ({{ $json.risk_score }}/100)

Key Concerns:

    {{#each $json.risk_factors}}
  • {{ this }}
    • {{/each}}

üí° Recommended Actions

  • Schedule immediate supplier review meeting
  • Request updated financial statements
  • Assess backup supplier readiness
  • Review contract terms and exit clauses
  • Increase monitoring frequency
üìß Contact Supplier üìä View Full Report

Enhanced monitoring recommended

Hello,

Our routine supplier risk assessment has identified {{ $json.supplier_name }} as requiring enhanced monitoring due to elevated risk factors.

üìä Risk Summary

Supplier: {{ $json.supplier_name }}

Current Risk Score: {{ $json.risk_score }}/100

    {{#each $json.risk_factors}}
  • {{ this }}
    • {{/each}}

üìã Monitoring Plan

  • Increase communication frequency
  • Request monthly performance reports
  • Monitor financial indicators closely
  • Prepare contingency plans

No immediate action required, but please keep this supplier on your radar.

Next assessment: {{ new Date(Date.now() + 7*24*60*60*1000).toLocaleDateString() }}
parameters.subject: üü° Medium Risk Supplier Update - {{ $json.supplier_name }}

parameters.content:
## Risk Management

üìä **Automated responses:**
- Critical risk: Emergency protocols
- High risk: Immediate contact
- Medium risk: Enhanced monitoring
- Low risk: Routine surveillance

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
